title: Crocheting Workshop
short_description: Intro to Crocheting - a beginners crocheting class.
long_description: On Saturday 8th of June from 10:30 until 12:30 we will be running an 'Intro to crocheting workshop' in Fab 0.23. This is a special session tailored specifically to complete newbies and beginners where we will be teaching the compete basics in an environment full of other beginners. This is a drop in so come along at any time.

schedule_organisation.name: Knitsoc
